name: Unfair Tic Tac Toe
description:
Have you ever wanted to lose at Tic Tac Toe over and over again? WELL NOW YOU CAN!!!

Introducing, Unfair Tic Tac Toe, using Asuki15's patent pending AI to ultimately and utterly destroy you at a game you thought you were good at, EVERY TIME!

In order to play, first choose a game mode (1P or 2P) and then start clicking the grid to place your pieces. When the game is finished, make sure to click the Reset Button. That's about it, normal Tic Tac Toe rules apply, it's only actually unfair when you turn on the AI.

If you donate, well first off thank you, but secondly, why?

This was done as a senior project and showcased as part of my high school graduation requirements, so I hope you enjoy.

If this product in any disappoints you I'm sorry, but what were you expecting? I'm just a singly person who had 9 weeks to make a project and instead procrastinated it until the last week, cut me some slack here.
